name: Lightbringer (Twop, MauricioH97, MK Game Music)
description:
"The Eternal Light has shattered and spread darkness throughout lands. Lightbringer, save us, find the Shards before it is too late."

Lightbringer is an exploration and light management game, submitted for Black & White Jam. Made in Unreal Engine 5 in 12 days.

The goal is to bring 4 Shards back to the Eternal altar.

Controls:
Tutorial will display them, but as a reference:

WASD - Movement
LMB - Attack
RMB - Drag (light, corpse, shard)

E - Convert into Light
Q - Absorb Light
Ctrl - Split Light

Shift - Sprint

Made by:
Twop (aka Nethya) - Game and level design
MK Game Music - Sound
Mau97 - 3D Models

Other assets used:
Free Unreal Engine marketplace assets, with textures removed.
